those polled are by their nature going to constitute britain's future muslim elite
half 50 of muslim students polled said they would be unsupportive of a friend's decision to leave islam
the majority 89 of muslim students polled said that men and women should be treated equally
two fifths 40 of muslim students polled supported the introduction of sharia into british law for muslims
just under a third of muslim students polled 32 said killing in the name of religion can be justified the majority of these said killing could be justified if the religion was under attack
over half of muslim students polled 54 were supportive of an islamic political party to represent the views of muslims at parliament
